attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: THIS IS THE WORST APP!

attributes.title: Our fav Cheeto 🥰
attributes.review: so I decided to download trumps app 😌, but unfortunately I don’t recommend 😕. Within five minutes of installation ⏰, my skin immediately transformed into an orange shade 🍊. Then, my television 📺 randomly started blasting 🔊 LAUV LAUV BY LAUV 🍞 which caused my grandmother 👵🏻 to have a sudden seizure and die 😵. Therefore, I do not recommend 🤗.
